@Spikkie

Select --- Add using Grub4dos ISO Emulation

or try:

... and others ...

any chance you have the windows install version of this ?
I never use the boot versions of this..

also i used this page and the grub tool to make a bootable Hirens CD for my microSD card on my cell phone.

http://www.hiren.info/pages/bootcd-on-usb-disk

it has a quick TUT and pictures with links to the two free clean tools used.
Good stuff !

thx nikita200!

path to small Linux based ISO:

Paragon.Hard.Disk.Manager.12.Professional.[...].iso/SOURCES/BOOT.WIM/Programs/Paragon Software/ISO/bootcd.iso

Grub4DOS: menu.lst:
title Paragon Festplatten-Manager 12 Pro ISO (10.0.19.15808)
map --mem /YourFolderWithISOs/bootcd.iso (hd32)
map --hook
chainloader (hd32)
boot
Thanks nikita200 - you are a class act
Which version of windows 32 or 64 bit?
